capability.name: Servicing Event History
capability.definition: This service domain captures, classifies and stores servicing activity and events to support root cause analysis
capability.role: The Servicing Event History service domain captures the details of servicing activity to support root cause analysis. The information captured can include summary details of the servicing activity, product access details and clickstream/voice records as necessary. The captured detail can be analyzed for staff assessment and training and to support procedural refinements
capability.example: A servicing contact is concluded and the contact details and result is captured. In cases the call is recorded

key_features.name: Log customer servicing event activity for the representative
key_features.description: Enables log customer servicing event activity for the representative to support this service domain captures, classifies and stores servicing activity and events to support root cause analysis

key_features.name: Log servicing issues and other activity
key_features.description: Enables log servicing issues and other activity to support this service domain captures, classifies and stores servicing activity and events to support root cause analysis

key_features.name: Support servicing log data extracts
key_features.description: Enables support servicing log data extracts to support this service domain captures, classifies and stores servicing activity and events to support root cause analysis

key_features.name: Maintain activity statistics and accumulators
key_features.description: Enables maintain activity statistics and accumulators to support this service domain captures, classifies and stores servicing activity and events to support root cause analysis
